video.title: Inami Le Bellacaïbos
video.synopsis: In the rainforest of Amazonia, ambitious 11-year-old Inami learns life lessons with the help of his friends and the guidance of his tribe's elders.

episodes.synopsis: Carras the shaman thinks it's time that Inami and Shimiwé face their first rite of passage into adulthood.
episodes.title: I Had a Dream

episodes.synopsis: A tropical storm is bearing down on the region. Inami warns Hyaéma of the danger, but Morikas thinks it's a ruse by the Bellacaïbos.
episodes.title: The Dark Curtain

episodes.synopsis: Morikas's potion is missing an ingredient: amber from the pink dolphins. With Pintos, the traitor, Morikas tries to capture the dolphins.
episodes.title: The Pink Dolphin

episodes.synopsis: A storm floods the salt mines, and the Bellacaïdo are forced to move for their survival. But Inami has a plan to delay the tribe's departure.
episodes.title: The Salt Quest

episodes.synopsis: Hyaéma has been bitten by a deadly snake. But without some venom from the snake to make an anitdote, Hyaéma's life is at risk.
episodes.title: The Venom of Discord

episodes.synopsis: Inami is convinced Hyaéma is in love with Fousiwé, a Patami boy. To forget his sorrows, Inami goes on a mission with Tatoune.
episodes.title: The Secret

episodes.synopsis: Inami, Shimiwé, Hyaéma and Fousiwé must undergo the "four elements" initiation. Custom dictates that the Bellacaïbos and Patamis observe a truce.
episodes.title: The Four Elements

episodes.synopsis: Inami is distracted while he is supposed to be looking after his little sister, leaving Aminata all alone in the forest.
episodes.title: Big Brother

episodes.synopsis: Convinced that the magic of the Great Tatou has possessed the son of their chief, strange painted warriors slip into the village and kidnap Shimiwé.
episodes.title: The Flame Men

episodes.synopsis: Shimiwé enters the forbidden sanctuary to meet his Animal Double. Inami learns that there is a serious risk when one tries to force one's destiny.
episodes.title: The Forbidden Sanctuary

episodes.synopsis: Carras the shaman will receive the immense wisdom of man and his double from the elder Juntos. But dark shaman Nerox wants this wisdom for himself.
episodes.title: The Dark Shaman

episodes.synopsis: Shimiwé must pass a test in which he has to pull a scale from a crocodile's back. Inami, who has a deep fear of crocodiles, is terrified.
episodes.title: The Crocodile Scale

episodes.synopsis: Inami and Shimiwé try to prove that Pintos has cheated his way into becoming chief, and they must do so as quickly as possible to avoid catastrophe.
episodes.title: The Price of Freedom

episodes.synopsis: Morikas has captured Tatoune, Inami's double. Under hypnosis, he instructs it to warn him whenever Inami goes to see Hyaéma. Can Tatoune be saved?
episodes.title: A Tatoune Full of Colors

episodes.synopsis: The glow of Inami's amulet is a message of some kind from the Great Tatou. Our heroes go to a volcano on the verge of erupting to complete a mission.
episodes.title: The Singing Mountain

episodes.synopsis: Inami and Shimiwé come upon an abandoned village in the forest. Among the magnificent things they find there is a Yano with a gold lintel.
episodes.title: A Strange Village

episodes.synopsis: While playing hide-and-seek, the kids find a strange necklace: the Black Diamond. The stone is cursed, however, and causes men to envy one another.
episodes.title: The Black Diamond

episodes.synopsis: Inami has a premonition of Hyaéma kissing Shimiwé. He tries stop it from coming true and sets out for the Well of Dreams, where dreams can be erased.
episodes.title: The Well of Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Morikas finds a mysterious cave, which breaks his ties to his double. His double, Carpos, suddenly attacks the Bellacaïbos and Pintos's double.
episodes.title: The Double Link

episodes.synopsis: Seeking a flower for a potion, Inami, Hyaéma, Shimiwé, Aminata and Tatoune land on an island that has been colonized by nasty spider-monkeys.
episodes.title: Mystery Island

episodes.synopsis: Inami, Shimiwé and Aminata discover Tatoune has a twin that is in danger. When they get to its lair, they find a female Tatoune about to give birth.
episodes.title: The Tatou Family

episodes.synopsis: Inami catches Shimiwé stealing the Great Tatou's diamond eyes. Shimiwé says he needs them to save his animal double's child and makes off with them.
episodes.title: The Eyes of the Big Tatou

episodes.synopsis: Inami, Shimiwé and Animata come across two boys from another tribe in the midst of the shark's tooth initiation. The oldest is terrified of sharks.
episodes.title: The Twelve Teeth of the Shark

episodes.synopsis: After a puma attacks a Bellacaïbos warrior, Pintos and the men of the village try to hunt the animal down. Inami goes to warn Hyaéma.
episodes.title: A Life for a Life

episodes.synopsis: Caras and Xiomaro communicate a message from the Hékuras: the Patamis and Bellacaïbos tribes must unite under the leadership of Pintos and Morikas.
episodes.title: The Strange Message from the Herukas

episodes.synopsis: The ultimate challenge, the "Anaconda" rite -- signaling the passage into adulthood -- has finally arrived for Inami, Shimiwé, Hayéma and Shama.
episodes.title: The Test of Peace
